description: man on right of image sits with his hands folded in his lap and his head turned to the right; he is wearing a suit coat and a tie and a dark shadow is cast to the right of his balding head; on the left of the image is the head of another man that is turned in profile toward the man on the right; both men are older in age and look off into the distance
inscription: LL margin of sheet, in pencil: Es existieren zwei Drucke. Platte ist / abgeschliffen.-- / Dr. Rauert E.113
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 20
title: Two War Comrades
